title: Coconut Curry Dipping Sauce Recipe
full_text:
Coconut Curry Dipping Sauce Recipe
Close
Jump to recipe
Prep
5 mins
Cook
5 mins
Active
5 mins
Total
10 mins
Serves
5 servings
Makes
2/3 cup sauce
Cook Mode
(Keep screen awake)
Ingredients
6
tablespoons
coconut milk
1
tablespoon
Thai red curry paste
2 1/2
teaspoons
fresh
juice
from
1
lime
2
teaspoons
soy sauce
2
teaspoons
Asian fish sauce
2
teaspoons
honey
1
teaspoon
grated fresh peeled
ginger
Directions
Combine coconut milk and curry paste in a small saucepan over medium heat and bring to a simmer. Cook, stirring, until slightly thickened and fragrant, about 30 seconds. Remove from heat and set aside.
Meanwhile, combine lime juice, soy sauce, fish sauce, honey, and ginger in a small bowl. Add coconut-curry mixture and stir thoroughly to combine. Serve.
